name: Overcome! (Name Subject to Change)
description:
This is a short hack and slash game telling the story of the main character who is transported into an imaginary world in search of a missing loved one. Will he find him?

This game is in a very unfinished state. I was not able to work on it much during the week but I plan to continue even after this game jam. 

Tools used:

Unity3D

Photoshop

Low-Poly Office Starter Kit
